DOCNAME: CASE OF LASZLO KOCSIS v. HUNGARY
CONCLUSION: Violation of Art. 6-1;Pecuniary damage - claim dismissed;Non-pecuniary damage - financial award
TEXT: CARDINAL . The applicant was born in DATE and lives in GPE , GPE .
CARDINAL . NORP In DATE criminal proceedings were instituted against the applicant and his accomplices on charges of counterfeiting money and of other offences .
CARDINAL . On DATE a bill of indictment was preferred .

CARDINAL . ORG held hearings on DATE , CARDINAL May and DATE . On DATE it ordered that the investigation be resumed . The time - limit for the completion of the investigation was prolonged on DATE and DATE , and also at the hearings on DATE , DATE and CARDINAL DATE . Simultaneously , legal assistance was being sought from the NORP authorities .

CARDINAL . Further hearings took place on DATE , DATE , DATE and DATE . At the hearing on DATE the case against CARDINAL co - defendants was separated since they were abroad . Another hearing was held on DATE .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG convicted the applicant of abuse of explosives and sentenced him to CARDINAL months’ imprisonment , suspended for DATE .
CARDINAL . On DATE the ORG - ORG quashed this judgment , essentially for procedural shortcomings , and remitted the case . It ordered that the case be given priority .
CARDINAL . In the resumed proceedings the case fell within ORG jurisdiction acting at first instance due to a legislative change .
CARDINAL . ORG held hearings on DATE and CARDINAL , DATE and DATE . On the latter date it appointed a medical expert . A further hearing was held and another expert appointed on DATE .
CARDINAL . DATE Additional hearings took place on DATE , DATE , DATE , CARDINAL DATE and DATE .

CARDINAL . After further hearings on DATE , DATE and CARDINAL DATE , on CARDINAL DATE the court convicted the applicant of abuse of explosives and sentenced him to CARDINAL months’ imprisonment , suspended for DATE . For the applicant , the judgment became final on DATE .
